languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт задумывается на мгновение, а затем коротко кивает.{/n} "Верно, элантах. Довольно с меня слепой надменности сородичей. Безвольного следования за слепцами, что должны зрить будущее, а ведут мой род лишь путями страданий. Я — Изгой. И я выполнила свой дол пред детьми Крудараха. За свои ошибки они должны заплатить сами".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт задумывается на мгновение, а затем коротко кивает.{/n} "Верно, элантах. Довольно с меня слепой надменности сородичей. Безвольного следования за слепцами, что должны зрить будущее, а ведут мой род лишь путями страданий. Я — Изгой. И я выполнила свой дол пред детьми Крудараха. За свои ошибки они должны заплатить сами".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet ponders your words for a moment and nods curtly.{/n} "You are not wrong, elantach. I have had enough of the blind arrogance of my kin. Of meekly following the blind who are supposed to see the future but who drive my people toward death and suffering instead. I am an Outcast. And I have done my duty to the children of Crudarach. They will have to pay for their own mistakes themselves."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт задумывается на мгновение, а затем коротко кивает.{/n} "Верно, элантах. Довольно с меня слепой надменности сородичей. Безвольного следования за слепцами, что должны зрить будущее, а ведут мой род лишь путями страданий. Я — Изгой. И я выполнила свой дол пред детьми Крудараха. За свои ошибки они должны заплатить сами".

Of meekly following the blind who are supposed to see the future but are driving my people toward death and suffering instead. I am an Exile. And I have done my duty to the children of Crudarach. They will have to pay for their own mistakes by themselves."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet sopesa tus palabras durante un momento y asiente brevemente.{/n} «No te falta razón, elantach. Ya me he cansado de la arrogancia obcecada de mis congéneres. De la sumisión a ciegos que supuestamente han de ver el futuro, pero que en vez de eso guían a los míos hacia el sufrimiento y la muerte. Soy una proscrita. Y he cumplido con mi deber para con los hijos de Crudarach. Que paguen ellos mismos por sus propios errores».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet ponders your words for a moment and nods curtly.{/n} "You are not wrong, elantach. I have had enough of the blind arrogance of my kin. Of meekly following the blind who are supposed to see the future but who drive my people toward death and suffering instead. I am an Outcast. And I have done my duty to the children of Crudarach. They will have to pay for their own mistakes themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet sopesa tus palabras durante un momento y asiente brevemente.{/n} «No te falta razón, elantach. Ya me he cansado de la arrogancia obcecada de mis congéneres. De la sumisión a ciegos que supuestamente han de ver el futuro, pero que en vez de eso guían a mi gente hacia el sufrimiento y la muerte. Soy una proscrita. Y he cumplido con mi deber para con los hijos de Crudarach. Que paguen ellos mismos por sus propios errores».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特仔细思索着你的话，随后简短地点了点头。{/n}“你说得没错，外界人。我已经受够了我的族人的短视与傲慢。那些本看到未来的人，只会温顺地追随瞎子的指引，将我的族人推向死亡与痛苦。我身为流浪者，已经尽了克鲁达拉赫的子嗣应尽的责任。如今，他们必须为自己的错误付出代价。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet ponders your words for a moment and nods curtly.{/n} "You are not wrong, elantach. I have had enough of the blind arrogance of my kin. Of meekly following the blind who are supposed to see the future but who drive my people toward death and suffering instead. I am an Outcast. And I have done my duty to the children of Crudarach. They will have to pay for their own mistakes themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特仔细思索着你的话，随后简短地点了点头。{/n}“你说得没错，外界人。我已经受够了我的族人的短视与傲慢。那些本看到未来的人，只会温顺地追随瞎子的指引，将我的族人推向死亡与痛苦。我身为流浪者，已经尽了克鲁达拉赫的子嗣应尽的责任。如今，他们必须为自己的错误付出代价。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet réfléchit quelques instants à ce que vous venez de dire, puis hoche sèchement la tête.{/n} « Vous n'avez pas tort, elantach. J'en ai assez de l'arrogance inconsidérée de mes semblables, de suivre docilement des aveugles qui sont censés voir l'avenir, mais qui conduisent les miens vers la mort et la souffrance. Je suis une Errante et j'ai accompli mon devoir envers les enfants de Crudarach. Il faudra désormais qu'ils paient eux-mêmes pour leurs erreurs. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet ponders your words for a moment and nods curtly.{/n} "You are not wrong, elantach. I have had enough of the blind arrogance of my kin. Of meekly following the blind who are supposed to see the future but who drive my people toward death and suffering instead. I am an Outcast. And I have done my duty to the children of Crudarach. They will have to pay for their own mistakes themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet réfléchit quelques instants à ce que vous venez de dire, puis hoche sèchement la tête.{/n} « Vous n'avez pas tort, elantach. J'en ai assez de l'arrogance inconsidérée de mes semblables, de suivre docilement des aveugles qui sont censés voir l'avenir, mais qui conduisent les miens vers la mort et la souffrance. Je suis une Errante et j'ai accompli mon devoir envers les enfants de Crudarach. Il faudra désormais qu'ils paient eux-mêmes pour leurs propres erreurs. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはあなたの言葉にしばらく考え込み、素っ気なくうなずいた。{/n}「あなたの言うことは間違っていない、エランタ。我は同族の盲目的な傲慢さにはうんざりだ。未来を見通すはずの者たちはむしろ、民を死と苦しみに向かわせているのに、皆おとなしく従う。我は追放者だ。クルダラの子供たちへの義務は果たした。彼らは自分たちの過ちは自分たちで償わなければならない」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet ponders your words for a moment and nods curtly.{/n} "You are not wrong, elantach. I have had enough of the blind arrogance of my kin. Of meekly following the blind who are supposed to see the future but who drive my people toward death and suffering instead. I am an Outcast. And I have done my duty to the children of Crudarach. They will have to pay for their own mistakes themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはあなたの言葉にしばらく考え込み、素っ気なくうなずいた。{/n}「あなたの言うことは間違っていない、エランタ。我は同族の盲目的な傲慢さにはうんざりだ。未来を見通すはずの者たちはむしろ、民を死と苦しみに向かわせているのに、皆おとなしく従う。我は追放者だ。クルダラの子供たちへの義務は果たした。彼らは自分たちの過ちは自分たちで償わなければならない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet denkt einen Augenblick über deine Worte nach und nickt dann knapp.{/n} "Ihr habt nicht unrecht, Elantach. Ich habe genug von der blinden Arroganz meiner Sippe. Genug davon, brav den Blinden zu folgen, die angeblich die Zukunft sehen, mein Volk in Wahrheit aber nur Richtung Tod und Leid führen. Ich bin eine Ausgestoßene. Und ich habe meine Pflicht den Kindern von Crudarach gegenüber getan. Sie müssen selbst für ihre Fehler bezahlen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet ponders your words for a moment and nods curtly.{/n} "You are not wrong, elantach. I have had enough of the blind arrogance of my kin. Of meekly following the blind who are supposed to see the future but who drive my people toward death and suffering instead. I am an Outcast. And I have done my duty to the children of Crudarach. They will have to pay for their own mistakes themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet denkt einen Augenblick über deine Worte nach und nickt dann knapp.{/n} "Ihr habt nicht unrecht, Elantach. Ich habe genug von der blinden Arroganz meiner Sippe. Genug davon, brav den Blinden zu folgen, die angeblich die Zukunft sehen, mein Volk in Wahrheit aber nur Richtung Tod und Leid führen. Ich bin eine Ausgestoßene. Und ich habe meine Pflicht den Kindern von Crudarach gegenüber getan. Sie müssen selbst für ihre Fehler bezahlen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sözlerin üzerine bir süre kafa yoran Yrliet, hafifçe başını eğiyor.{/n} "Haksız değilsin elantach. Soydaşlarımın şuursuz küstahlıkları da geleceği görmesi gerekirken halkımı ölüme ve acıya sürükleyen körleri sakince takip etmeleri de canıma yetti. Ben bir Yurtsuz'um ve Crudarach'ın çocuklarına karşı görevimi yerine getirdim. Kendi hatalarının bedelini artık kendileri ödemek zorunda."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet ponders your words for a moment and nods curtly.{/n} "You are not wrong, elantach. I have had enough of the blind arrogance of my kin. Of meekly following the blind who are supposed to see the future but who drive my people toward death and suffering instead. I am an Outcast. And I have done my duty to the children of Crudarach. They will have to pay for their own mistakes themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, sözlerin üzerinde bir süre kafa yorarak hafifçe başını eğiyor.{/n} "Haksız değilsin elantach. Soydaşlarımın şuursuz küstahlıkları da geleceği görmesi gerekirken halkımı ölüme ve acıya sürükleyen körleri sakince takip etmeleri de canıma yetti. Ben bir Yurtsuzum ve Crudarach'ın çocuklarına karşı görevimi erine getirdim. Kendi hatalarının bedelini artık kendileri ödemek zorunda."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
